<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">a8cbcd0c58b1d210ea709b2df38a02bf</macroponent><name>New client script 2</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    

    try{
        var userSysId = api.context.session.user.sys_id
        var clickedFilter = event?.payload?.params?.query || "assignment_group.manager="+userSysId
        console.log("Changing Filter to "+clickedFilter)
        api.setState('myTeamFilter',clickedFilter)
    }catch(err){
        console.log("error")
        console.log(err)
    

}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-02-24 10:42:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>d0d41467c3b71210c5d75242b4013123</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New client script 2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Invoices" source="x_1097202_invoices">48c5f8b7832d521038c8f4a6feaad30d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Invoices">48c5f8b7832d521038c8f4a6feaad30d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d0d41467c3b71210c5d75242b4013123</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-02-24 10:42:45</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
